item.title: Two potholes on either side of Maple Drive, by no 38, 7th January
item.description:

item.title: Whole western side of road is failing, 7th January
item.description:
The whole side of the road is failing as vehicles try to pass each other. The road is not up to the increasing amounts of traffic using it from the nearby housing developments. Another example of GCC failing to ensure infrastructure is up to the increased demands of new housing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cleeve Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gl527yq, 7th January
item.description:
I paid for a person to dispose of my household rubbish on 29th December, yesterday I was informed that mine and another persons rubbish had been fly tipped in Bishops Cleeve. I have sent an online report to Gloucester police and, they have advised me to contact you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5,6, The Cornfields, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 7th January
item.description:
The tree is on the property of Annisfail however we understand the property is currently empty as the owner has gone into a care home. The tree is very close to the edge of the property and the buses and lorries appear to be scraping the lower branches and taking some off. We are concerned that should the tree fail it could pose a threat as it is so close to the road and pavement.
Report on FixMyStreet
